subsc: Agricultural extension and research,Other social services,Central government administration
trustfund: TF021946-BRAZILIAN RAIN FOREST (ADMINISTRATIVE),TF021953-RFT INDIGENOUS LANDS PROJECT

abstracts.cdata!:
The general objective of the Indigenous
            Reserves Project is to improve the conservation of natural
            resources in indigenous areas and increase the well-being of
            indigenous people through: 1) regularization of indigenous
            lands in the Legal Amazon; and 2) improve protection of
            indigenous populations and areas. To achieve these
            objectives, the project will finance technical assistance,
            training, surveying and demarcation services, equipment,
            vehicles, pilot community-based and applied research
            sub-projects, and operational costs, including travel, per
            diem, fuel and supplies, for the following four components:
            1) regularization of indigenous lands; 2) surveillance and
            protection of indigenous areas; 3) capacity-building and
            studies; and 4) support to project management.
